column2: We used to hold this land before the Congress of Vienna, but we will not abandon our claims due to our enemy's injustice.
We used to hold this land before the Congress of Vienna, but we will not abandon our claims due to our enemy's injustice.
Long have the Saxon states been separated, all because of so many primitive inheritance laws , let us reunite once more, by force if necessary.
